task: Develop a basic 'Grim Fandango' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Decorate, decorate'.
name: Grim Revelry

branding_data.short_description: Grim Revelry is an adventure game set in the Land of the Dead, where players navigate a richly decorated underworld filled with puzzles and mysteries.
branding_data.detailed_description: In Grim Revelry, players step into the shoes of a charming skeletal travel agent navigating the intricately decorated Land of the Dead. Inspired by the classic 'Grim Fandango', this game takes you on a journey through a vibrant and ornate underworld, where every corner is filled with lavish details and hidden secrets. Players must solve puzzles and interact with a cast of eccentric characters, all while unraveling a plot of intrigue and adventure. The game emphasizes exploration and discovery in its beautifully crafted environments, where decoration and detail bring the world to life.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
